title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository with the CLI, Go library, and Docker images for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, and push models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a local LLM for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes, Raspberry Pi, M1 Mac, and with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat/generate workflows without code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that proxies to Ollama with session memory and model selector.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Unofficial Dart/Flutter package for chatting with Ollama models from mobile or desktop.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings and strong types for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, new models, integrations, and troubleshooting Ollama.
